website_summaries.verdict: This model earns high marks for its lightweight, durable steel frame and no-slip platform that keeps items in place when in use.
pros: Steel frame is tough enough to handle frequent use, yet lightweight so users don't strain
Platform can handle up to 330 pounds and has a rubberized surface to prevent items from slipping when stacked
The handle folds flat to the 29 by 18 inch platform when not in use for easy storage
cons: Due to the placement of the wheels, this model has a tendency to tip if heavy items are not centered on the platform

customer_reviews.title: Time and Back Saver
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy cart is fantastic for transporting stuff without breaking your back. How to assemble: attach the swivel wheels on the handle end. How to close: step down on the thin rod on the handle side (also makes opening easier). Things I have transported so far: boxes, armchair, pictures, 6-foot cat tree, Captain Kirk.
customer_reviews.author: JR8888

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy boxed items!
customer_reviews.text: These carts are great for helping move your daughter out of a 6th floor apartment provided you have an elevator. The 330 # size is great for boxes. I also have a 660# one that’s great for moving boxed furniture. My daughter and I have moved some pretty heavy items with these carts by ourselves. I gave 4 stars for maneuverability because it helps with really heavy or tall items to have two people, one pushing and one guiding the front of the cart. Only problem we encountered was elevator being broke during one move and having to use stairs. But we did use cart to roll to and from stairs. Great for flat services!
customer_reviews.author: M&SWiz

customer_reviews.title: pretty good item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just add the weels and it ready to use , pretty good item for the price , arrived just on time The base it’s a little bit slippery so if u are planning to move heavy stuff add something like a peace of a yoga mat .
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Paz

customer_reviews.title: rolling cart
customer_reviews.text: We needed an easier way to transport display items from the car to the show room. I had seen a vendor with a cart like this a couple of years ago and decided to get one for myself. It's fantastic! One trip, perfectly balanced, and easy to roll through the parking lot to the building. I would recommend this cart for anyone who needs to move things they can't carry.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my craft shows. It's a sturdy little cart, pretty easy to maneuver. It's not for tall people, I have to lean over to push it, I'm 5'8". It's a little hard to fold up and down, you have to push the bar down to do that, it's a little stiff. I actually had to look up how to fold it up because the directions about this cart were terrible. It will work great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Our contractor suggested I get such a device as I was using a heavy, clumsy thing. I looked at the hardware stores and big box hardware and only found expensive, much more heavy duty carts. This one carries a good load, folds small, and is very user friendly! Delighted with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a slightly lager one about 10 years ago and it wore out do to our heavy use. Our issue not there's . I saw this one on amazon which was not the original manufacturer and smaller and ordered but had reservations on size. Love it more than the larger old one. So much easier to get around. My advice to you would be to measure the size and if it works for your projects go for It.
customer_reviews.author: playgolf64

customer_reviews.title: PILE OF SCRAP METAL
customer_reviews.text: SECOND ITEM I GOT DEFECTIVE WHEELS HAVE NO BALL BEARINGS PAINT IS BUBBLED PARTS ARE BENT ITEM IS ABSOLUTE GARBAGE
customer_reviews.author: NAT  M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolute garbage. Spend your money if you want a piece of trash that will roll less than 200m before collapsing a wheel. Says it can support 300 pounds but catastrophically failed with less than 100 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wooden

customer_reviews.title: It takes 2,TO bring.that upper section up right.after a while.one can do it by yourself.
customer_reviews.text: IT COMES WITH JUST YOU ADDING THE WHEELS.MY ONLY TROUBLE WAS TO GET THE OTHER PART TO UPRIGHT POSITION.IT LOOKS LIKEYOU STAND ON BAR, LIFT UP,NO I COULD NOT GET IT UP I ENDED UP GETTING,A MAN,AND ASSISTING TO GET IT UP,.it does hold totes HEAVY boxes,NO large furniture.no large HEAVY washing machines,but all other.good to go
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Bobalek

customer_reviews.title: Just so-so
customer_reviews.text: I have had similar carts that function more easily than this one. It's fine when it is open, but you have to step on the spring bar to open the cart and to close it. It is very tight and difficult to use. The other carts I have similar to this one open without having to step on the spring bar and close very easily. This one is a hassle both directions. So, it's just okay, but I would not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Requires a couple tools to put together, but was very simple and straightforward. Works great, steers straight, folds down easily. If you’re over 6’ tall you might need a mode with a taller handle bar. I’m 5’10” and had to bend over a little to push it, pulling was fine, neither position was uncomfortable for a short distance. Good wheels over bumpy pavement, have not used it on grass so can’t speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart without even putting anything on it
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the product and put all the screws in like I was supposed to. I pushed it out and as soon as I did so screws started coming out one by one, until all the screws fell out, making the cart itself fall apart and making it unusable. In the process I lost some screws, too, since this was outside in the dark. Terrible waste of money - NEVER buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: 962019mwi

customer_reviews.title: Saved our bacon
customer_reviews.text: Made moving into college dorms for 3 kids relatively painless. We are glad to have purchased this cart, even if we never use it again. But we will when we move them back home.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY J GROSSO

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me with my move. It worked perfectly to haul a bunch of stuff in and out. Now I keep it in my car and use it to bring groceries/other things from my car to my apartment. No need to lift anything anymore, just haul them.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: The cart was smaller then planned. The handle is short to so hard to push around. Couldnt figure out how to put the handle down took 5 min!!! Wish It was a bigger cart for what I need to carry
customer_reviews.author: liberty clark

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It said 300 lbs capacity but I use it to move something less than 200 lbs,already damaged the wheels. You get what you pay for. I end up bought new dolly from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Wish the handle could adjust
customer_reviews.text: I like it but expected it to be a lil bit bigger and wished the handle. Could adjust to my height or just a lil bit higher
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Will use for moving college student in and out of the dorm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best price and value.
customer_reviews.text: In comparison to other competitors' products, this one has the best price vs value. Has the sturdiness and strength.
customer_reviews.author: JCSCASAMM

customer_reviews.title: Great little hauling aide.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to fold and unfold; sturdy yet lightweight and very easy to maneuver. Extremely handy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used only a few times. Was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cocostar98

customer_reviews.title: Great for instacart or moving college students
customer_reviews.text: Love this and it works well but lost the instructions and cannot figure how to fold. Can someone please post a pic of them!
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome... my kids got it for my portable wash machine so I can pull to kitchen to hook up and wash love it
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cart
customer_reviews.text: Perfect heavy duty cart with easy maneuverability. Good price after all.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson W. Kwong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Easy to operate. Always have one of these handy at home.
customer_reviews.author: kazekozo77

customer_reviews.title: Not good for gravel or dirt
customer_reviews.text: This works great for clean flat surfaces, even went on grass fairly well. But no go on gravel, or dusty driveways. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: becky s.

customer_reviews.title: Indoor use
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart twice outside going two blocks - even after tightening everything. I would not suggest using it other than maybe hallways indoors. Actually, just get a better one. Not worth the money, but we managed to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amee

customer_reviews.title: Solid and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product works well, will pass ad on to my friends that would like one.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Its Weight In Gold!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I was moving and needed something to lessen the load and trips (66 yrs young). This has been one of the best purchases for the money that I have made. It handles extremely well and carries quite a bit. I use it now to transport my shopping trips Into the house. You will not regret purchasing this item!
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: It's not worthy.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it is so bad. When i open the package,it is very dirty which seems like a second handed cart. Moreover,it does not go with a hammer which makes me impossible to install everything. When i was using it,the wheels vanished as well as the nail. I finally threw it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my catering business and it does the job perfectly. Fits in all of my chefs cars
customer_reviews.author: Farzad Youshei

customer_reviews.title: muscle rack
customer_reviews.text: I use this item as a helping hand to pull heavy loads in the garden...Love it.
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: great for moving small boxes/items
customer_reviews.text: very easy to assemble... just need to mount and tighten the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Werner

customer_reviews.title: It is right for me in my job.  Small elementary school cafeteria
customer_reviews.text: Love how light the cart is and I can pack 4 boxes on it. Only the front wheels rotate, It would be easier if all 4 wheels rotated in small areas. Fits under the counter easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Moving Cart
customer_reviews.text: Used for moving small heavy items. Did the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy this again
customer_reviews.text: This product handler is to short. The picture of this product doesn’t do justice.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: No parking brakes.  False advertising.
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate description. I bought this model only because it was advertised as having parking brakes. Also, wheels are 4", not 5" as specified. Otherwise, have not yet used it, am contemplating returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Too small for a tall person and but very easy to wheel sound .
customer_reviews.author: Azul

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: For 40 bucks, it's a solid purchase. It doesn't have the greatest handles but it gets you point A to point B.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little dolly. My only issue was it came delivered with too few screws. I called and they sent more right away. I love it now.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Cart is so unsteady that items shake off when being rolled. Consider one with sides. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: April Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college move in.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great help at college move in day. Can handle two 40 gal totes for plus mics bags on top without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Donachie

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart
customer_reviews.text: I like the cart for bringing packages up to the house from office. Its just a little smaller then I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good and solid product just little con for missing a bolt overall I am very happy to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Tanompong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, takes up little space, over all best item I bought in awhile..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, I use it to move boxes from one appartment to another, now I use it for bringing in the groceries, taking heavy laundry basket to car and back in.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Miller

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The foot bar that holds the handle in place was missing. This means that you can only pull the cart and not push it. Quite an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kiener

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this Folding Platform Cart. Very easy to assemble, with clear directions and minimal amount of loose parts. Exactly as described and worth every penny. Folds to make it exceptionally easy to store. My only complaint was that I had to go onto YouTube to figure out how it collapses. Just step on the crossbar and you're in business. Don't hesitate to purchase this item and you will be extremely pleased with it, as I am.
customer_reviews.author: LI Grandma

product_meta.title: Muscle Rack FPC2918 Heavy Duty 330 lb. Capacity Folding Platform Cart, 11" Height, 18" Width, 29" Length, 330 Pounds Load Capacity
product_meta.description: This folding platform truck is made of a durable steel construction.The easy rolling 5-inch mute casters give the truck a 330-pound load capacity. It folds up neatly for compact storage. Integrated locking brake the platform contains two Parking brakes that prevent rolling of the vehicle.
